data.actual_result: On your status, the song will continue to count the time left until the song ends like the song is still playing.
data.expected_result: It should stop and show nothing, just like it does if you were to pause the song without it being on repeat
data.short_description: When your spotify song is on loop and you pause it, it will be paused on spotify but it will continue counting on status
